document_data.mainbody:
ildaryns Ride was a small roadway found in eastern Sembia that connected Ordulin in the west with Yhaunn in the east on the coast of the Sea of Fallen Stars.
Tildaryns Ride ran in nearly a straight line from west to east, extending where the East Way terminated in Ordulin.
The roadways namesake was Antur Tildaryn, the man who built it. Antur was a businessman and an investor who rose from rags to riches in Yhaunn long before the 14 century DR.
